featured.text: In the 1920s a mechanical potato peeler was invented and soon there were potato chips in abundance.

definition.zh_def: 削皮器，一種用於去除水果或蔬菜表皮的工具。
definition.en_def: A tool used for removing the skin from fruits or vegetables.
definition.example: I used a peeler to prepare the apples for the pie.
